sentences.en: A cold is an infection of the upper respiratory tract.
sentences.cn: 感冒是上呼吸道的感染。

sentences.en: A vast tract of land is ready for development.
sentences.cn: 一大片广阔的土地可待开发。

sentences.en: Even small tract houses, in regimented rows appeared well cared for.
sentences.cn: 甚至一排排象兵营似的小片房屋看上去也管理很好.

sentences.en: Foods are broken down in the digestive tract.
Fossils can only tell us so much about the shape of the vocal tract because much of it is soft tissue.
sentences.cn: 因为发音系统大部分是软组织，无缘变成化石，现存的化石也只能告诉我们一点呼吸道的形状。

sentences.en: He had an infection in the upper respiratory tract.
He's suffering from an acute infection of the lower respiratory tract.
sentences.cn: 他患有急性下呼吸道感染.

sentences.en: In the past nothing could grow on this tract of land.
Instruments developed at the hospital allow doctors to thread microscopic telescopes into the digestive tract.
sentences.cn: 医院开发研制的仪器使医生们得以将显微内镜伸入消化道。

sentences.en: Respiratory tract fluid is the major product of the normal lung.
sentences.cn: 呼吸道液体是正常肺的主要产物.

sentences.en: She produced a feminist tract, "Comments on Birth-Control", in 1930.
sentences.cn: 她1930年写了篇女性主义的短文《论节育》。

sentences.en: The bay shore of the silverthorn tract was very irregular.
sentences.cn: 银刺地带那儿的海岸线曲折蜿蜒.

sentences.en: The respiratory tract conveys oxygen - rich air to the lungs.
sentences.cn: 呼吸道给肺输送 富氧 的空气.

sentences.en: The secretory system of the respiratory tract is probably the most appreciated.
sentences.cn: 呼吸道的分泌系统可能是最先被意识到的.

sentences.en: They have lifted water from the Yellow River onto the high land and reaped a good cotton harvest on a 300 - acre tract.
sentences.cn: 他们把黄河水引上高原,使300公亩棉田获得丰收.

sentences.en: To the north of the river is an immense wooded tract.

words.tran_cn: 束；大片土地，地带；小册子

trans.tran_cn: 大片土地，（神经纤维的）束，小册子，<古>一段时间，长时间
